articles.author: Heinz Schenk
articles.title: How 'binning' social media proved a catalyst for polarising Markram's resurgence
articles.description: Aiden Markram has attributed his promising renaissance as an international cricketer partly to getting off social media.
articles.content:

articles.title: Yorkshire cricket racism hearing to begin
articles.description: Michael Vaughan and Azeem Rafiq are due to appear at a hearing into the Yorkshire racism scandal, which starts on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Former Yorkshire cricketer Azeem Rafiq is due to appear in person to give evidence at this week's disciplinary hearing
The racism scandal that has engulfed Yorkshire County Cricket Club and the Engl… [+11219 chars]

articles.author: Brittany Carter
articles.title: The Australian women's cricket team have won everything on offer, so what's left for them to conquer?
articles.description: Over the past 12 months, the Australian women's cricket team have won the T20 World Cup, a Commonwealth Games gold medal and the 50-over Cricket World Cup. So what's left for these white-ball heroes to conquer? Test cricket.
articles.content:
Another T20 World Cup has come and gone, and the Australian women have completed the hat-trick, winning three straight titles to lift the trophy for the sixth time.
In the space of less than 12 mont… [+10728 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
